scripts.build: pkg --targets=node14-win-x64 --output=index.exe . && move index.exe ../Build/ETS2_Dashboard/            && pkg --targets node14-win-x64 updater.js && xcopy "updater.exe" "../Build/ETS2_Dashboard/updater.exe" /y /E && xcopy "entry.tp" "../Build/ETS2_Dashboard/entry.tp" /y /E  && xcopy "entry.tp" "../Build/AutoUpdater/entry.tp" /y /E && xcopy "config.json" "../Build/ETS2_Dashboard/config.json" /y /E && xcopy "config.json" "../Build/AutoUpdater/config.json" /y /E && move updater.exe ../Build/AutoUpdater/ && cd ../Releases/Plugin/ && del ETS2_Dashboard_AutoUpdater.tpp && del ETS2_Dashboard.tpp && 7z a -tzip ETS2_Dashboard_AutoUpdater.tpp ../../Build/ETS2_Dashboard && xcopy "../../Build/AutoUpdater" "../../Build/tmp/ETS2_Dashboard" /y /E  && 7z a -tzip ETS2_Dashboard.tpp ../../Build/tmp/ETS2_Dashboard && cd ../../Build/tmp && del ETS2_Dashboard /S
